summary: Core Valentine page UI and celebratory Yes-state appear implemented with a warm Valentine palette and use of the specified image URLs, but the required generated image assets are not present in the diff and an unrequested backend canister plus unrequested auth/actor plumbing were added (also touching paths marked immutable).

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated images into the app as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the Valentine page layout.
missing_requirements.reason: The Valentine page references the images by URL, but the diff does not show the required files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a backend canister file despite the request to keep the app frontend-only and not add backend services.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says to keep the app frontend-only unless explicitly required; diff adds backend code.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Internet Identity / actor + React Query plumbing (authentication-related infrastructure) even though authentication flows are a non-goal and not required for the Valentine page.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals include Internet Identity login/auth flows; diff introduces InternetIdentityProvider, useInternetIdentity hook, and useActor hook with identity handling.

hallucinated_features.description: Edited/introduced files in paths marked as immutable (must not be edited).
hallucinated_features.reason: Constraints list these frontend immutable paths as not to be edited, but the diff includes them as added files.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a promotional footer/link (caffeine.ai referral) not requested by the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement mentions adding a footer or outbound referral link; this introduces extra user-facing content.
